column4: Is there a way to change the time it takes for the unity dock to appear when I touch the left side of the screen? That second is just a bit too long for me. Upper left corner is better, but it's annoying to go there every time.
try holding down the super key (win key) and see if that delay is too long for you too
yeah. that's a good idea. thanks! But is there a setting somewhere to change the delay manually?
lol, i'm like you waiting for someone to say how to tweak the unity launcher
